# The Wayward Son

| runtime        =
| country        = USA
| language       = Silent..English titles
}}
The Wayward Son is a 1914 silent short film directed by Harry C. Mathews and produced by the Victor Company.
It is preserved in the Library of Congress collection.Catalog of Holdings The American Film Institute Collection and The United Artists Collection at The Library of Congress, (
Cast
*Charles Hutchison - The Wayward Son
*Elsie Albert - The Son's Sweetheart
*Charles Manley - The Father
